name: Helping Out
description: The user is asked to Donate Food, Blood or Time then inputs their zip code to get results for charities near them.

name: Hashtag Goals
tech: Node.js, Express, Sequelize, Passport, Bcrypt, Heroku
description: The user creates an account then chooses a goal and how many times a week they can dedicate to achieving their goal. A calendar populates a series of minor milestones at their requested frequency.

name: Eat A Burger
description: The Eat a Burger app lets the user Eat/Uneat and Create a burger

name: Weather Dashboard
description: The Weather Dashboard utilizes the Openweather API to display specific weather information based on an city submitted into the Search input.

name: Coding Quiz
description: A timed quiz consisting of 5 questions, populated randomly, on the subject of JavaScript.

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: 9am - 5pm scheduler with blocks highlighted by past, present and future. A user's input information is saved in local storage.
